key_risks: Supply chain disruptions due to reliance on third-party suppliers
Regulatory compliance risks with standards like ISO/IEC 17025 and ANSI/NCSL Z540
Economic sensitivity to downturns in aerospace and energy industries
controversies: Severance agreements with key executives in the event of a change in control
Mixed analyst sentiment despite strong fundamentals
governance_issues: Potential instability due to executive severance agreements
